key: Audio Lab is an advanced AI-powered audio processing platform that offers professional-grade audio processing features through an intuitive visual workflow interface. Whether you are a content creator, podcast host, musician, or business professional, Audio Lab can help you enhance your audio content using cutting-edge AI technology.
converts-spoken-audio-into-accurate-text: Converts spoken audio into accurate text transcriptions using advanced AI speech recognition technology, supporting multiple languages and audio formats
remote-url-of-the-voice-audio-file: Remote URL of the voice audio file
converts-written-text-into-natural-sound: Converts written text into natural-sounding speech audio using AI-powered text-to-speech synthesis with multiple voice options
text-content-to-be-converted-into-speech: Text content to be converted into speech
directory-path-where-the-generated-audio: Directory path where the generated audio file will be saved
voice-timbre-selection-for-speech-genera: Voice timbre selection for speech generation
custom-filename-for-the-generated-audio-: Custom filename for the generated audio (optional)
this-subflow-converts-audio-files-to-tex: This subflow converts audio files to text using speech recognition technology. It uploads the audio file to cloud storage and processes it through speech-to-text conversion.
audio-file-to-be-transcribed-into-text: Audio file to be transcribed into text
audio-lab-demo-text-to-speech-to-text: Audio Lab Demo - Text to Speech to Text
demonstrates-complete-audio-processing-w: Demonstrates complete audio processing workflow: converts text to speech, plays audio, uploads to cloud, then converts back to text
converts-chinese-text-to-natural-speech-: Converts Chinese text to natural speech using selected voice timbre
plays-the-generated-audio-file-for-quali: Plays the generated audio file for quality verification
uploads-the-generated-audio-file-to-clou: Uploads the generated audio file to cloud storage for remote access
transcribes-the-uploaded-audio-file-back: Transcribes the uploaded audio file back to text for verification
shows-the-final-transcribed-text-result-: Shows the final transcribed text result for comparison with original input
converts-spoken-audio-into-accurate-text: Converts spoken audio into accurate text transcriptions using advanced speech recognition technology.
remote-url-of-the-voice-audio-file-to-tr: Remote URL of the voice audio file to transcribe. Supports MP3, WAV, FLAC, M4A, AAC, OGG, and WMA formats.
accurate-text-transcription-of-the-spoke: Accurate text transcription of the spoken audio content. Supports multiple languages with automatic language detection.
text-content-to-be-converted-into-speech: Text content to be converted into speech audio. Supports Chinese and English text with natural pronunciation.
directory-path-where-the-generated-mp3-a: Directory path where the generated MP3 audio file will be saved. Defaults to OOMOL storage directory.
voice-timbre-selection-for-speech-genera: Voice timbre selection for speech generation. Choose from 5 different Chinese voice personalities with emotional expression.
custom-filename-for-the-generated-audio-: Custom filename for the generated audio file (without extension). If not provided, uses current timestamp.
absolute-file-path-of-the-generated-mp3-: Absolute file path of the generated MP3 audio file ready for playback or further processing.
complete-workflow-that-converts-local-au: Complete workflow that converts local audio files to text using speech recognition. Handles file upload to cloud storage and transcription processing.
local-audio-file-to-be-transcribed-into-: Local audio file to be transcribed into text. Supports MP3, WAV, FLAC, M4A, AAC, OGG, and WMA formats.
accurate-text-transcription-of-the-spoke: Accurate text transcription of the spoken audio content. Supports multiple languages with automatic language detection.
